name: chessagine-mcp-v0.2
description: Connect to ChessAgine Chess Context Protocol tools, access to stockfish, chess board state, analysis of themes making LLM more chess aware, get access to chessdb, and lichess games.

tools.name: get-theme-scores
tools.description: Analyze chess position themes (material, mobility, space, positional factors, king safety) for strategic evaluation from white or black perspective.

tools.name: analyze-variation-themes
tools.description: Track how chess themes evolve across a sequence of moves, showing positional changes and strategic developments in variations.

tools.name: get-theme-progression
tools.description: Monitor the progression of a specific chess theme (material/mobility/space/positional/king safety) throughout a variation of moves.

tools.name: compare-variations
tools.description: Compare multiple chess variations side-by-side, analyzing theme changes and strategic differences to identify the strongest continuation.

tools.name: find-critical-moments
tools.description: Identify key moves in a variation where significant theme changes occur, highlighting turning points and critical decision moments.

tools.name: get-stockfish-analysis
tools.description: Perform deep Stockfish engine analysis of any chess position, providing best moves, evaluation scores, principal variations, and strategic reasoning.

tools.name: get-stockfish-move-analysis
tools.description: Analyze a chess position after playing a specific move, showing the resulting evaluation and best continuations using Stockfish engine.

tools.name: is-legal-move
tools.description: Verify if a proposed move is legal in the given chess position, ensuring move validation before analysis or gameplay.

tools.name: boardstate-to-prompt
tools.description: Generate detailed text description of a chess position after a move, converting board state into natural language for analysis and discussion.

tools.name: get-chess-knowledgebase
tools.description: Access comprehensive chess knowledge including Silman's imbalances, Fine's principles, endgame theory, and practical improvement checklists.

tools.name: get-lichess-master-games
tools.description: Retrieve master-level games and opening statistics from Lichess database for any position, including win rates and popular continuations.

tools.name: get-lichess-games
tools.description: Fetch regular Lichess user games and opening statistics, providing insights into how positions are played at various skill levels.

tools.name: get-chessdb-analysis
tools.description: Query ChessDB for position analysis with candidate moves, evaluations, win rates, and move quality ratings from extensive game databases.

tools.name: generate-chess-board-view-artificat-using-html
tools.description: Renders chess board in HTML

tools.name: generate-dynamic-gameview-html
tools.description: Render dynamic chess game

tools.name: fetch-chess-puzzle
tools.description: Fetches puzzles from Lichess puzzle database, can query by theme or rating

tools.name: get-puzzle-themes
tools.description: gets the puzzle themes

tools.name: fetch-user-recent-games-from-lichess
tools.description: Fetch 20 recent games from Lichess

tools.name: fetch-lichess-game
tools.description: fetch a single lichess game

tools.name: generate-game-review
tools.description: Generate detailed game review dashboard or text version using theme stats

prompts.name: analysis
prompts.text: Analyze this position using ChessAgine Mode
